body.description: Degree Advanced Vanilla & Jasmine Antiperspirant Deodorant lets you face the day with confidence. This antiperspirant for women features 72-hour sweat and odor protection and the warm, inviting scent of vanilla and jasmine. Only Degree has MotionSense technology that moves in sync with your body. This antiperspirant deodorant releases a burst of subtle fragrance every time you move for nonstop protection. Degree Advanced Vanilla & Jasmine antiperspirant deodorant keeps you feeling fresher, drier, and more confident. This powerful antiperspirant deodorant responds when you need it most, so you don't have to worry about slowing down. Simply swipe and start moving. This antiperspirant deodorant for women with a warm fragrance gives you the confidence to keep moving all day long. Degree Vanilla & Jasmine keeps you feeling cool, fresh and protected from sweat and odor. Degree Advanced Vanilla & Jasmine also comes in a convenient antiperspirant deodorant dry spray. At Degree, we're doing everything we can to help keep the planet moving. That's why we're increasing our use of reusable materials, making it easier for you to recycle our antiperspirant and dry spray packaging. Whatever you do, however you do it, Degree wants to help inspire the confidence in you to move more, and with this antiperspirant deodorant, it'll provide you the confidence that sweat and odor will not get in the way of your progress. Degree. It won't let you down.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Degree Advanced Vanilla & Jasmine Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick helps keep you fresh and dry, no matter what. This Degree antiperspirant offers 72-hour sweat and odor protection with the sweet, intoxicating scent of vanilla and jasmine.

72-HOUR NONSTOP SWEAT PROTECTION This antiperspirant deodorant stick delivers long-lasting sweat protection that helps keep you moving with confidence. MOTIONSENSE TECHNOLOGY Works in sync with your body to release bursts of a sweet and intoxicating fragrance, keeping you fresh all day. UNSTOPPABLE CONFIDENCE Degree doesn't stop working, no matter how much you move. MOVING TOGETHER TOWARD SUSTAINABILITY At Degree, we're committed to creating the most sustainable and inclusive products possible. As well as increasing our use of reusable materials, we're making it easier for you to recycle our antiperspirant and dry spray packaging.

Degree Advanced Vanilla & Jasmine Antiperspirant Deodorant Dry Spray, 3.8 oz Degree Advanced Lavender & Waterlily Antiperspirant Deodorant, 2.6 oz Degree UltraClear Black+White Pure Clean Antiperspirant Deodorant, 2.6 oz Main Benefit Degree Vanilla & Jasmine Antiperspirant Deodorant Dry Spray keeps you feeling fresh and clean with 72-hour sweat and odor protection. Keep moving with this antiperspirant deodorant. Just twist, swipe, and move with confidence. This deodorant stick lasts for 72 hours and protects against white marks and yellow stains, making it one of Degree's best deodorants for women.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like the smell and the price.
reviews.reviewText: I have 4 of them the store don't have much selection.They are hard to find the scent. you want.So I found these great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the ease of application, smell, texture, and quick drying! It is so long acting and I never have to worry about it not working. There is no staining of my clothing either. I think it is the best product on the market right now!

reviews.reviewText: I love degree it lasts and I always feel fresh

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love Degree antiperspirants and have bought them for years. I was getting tired of the same old fresh powder fragrance so I orderedthis instead. Smells divine. Light scent doesn’t overpower perfume, stays fresh and keeps me dry all day.I get the same great coverage as I have come to expect from Degree products but with a new lovely scent.Thank you.❤️‼️

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps me dry
reviews.reviewText: It stays on and protects all day. It smells great, and a good value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I don’t smell awful any more
reviews.reviewText: I hate having to use an antiperspirant, but have to say, this one works for me. I usually smell like a skunk after a few days, but not with this product. I cannot get in and out of a bathtub like when I was younger. And my shoulders don’t work, and they scream with pain when I try. So this product is a God Send to me. It doesn’t have a strong fake perfume smell and it covers up/stops my horrible BO. What more can I say in its favor. The product is small enough for my almost useless arms to hold and apply to my underarms. Yay!
